placeholders.agencyDescription: Describe your agency's mission and services

messages.settingsError: Failed to save settings. Please try again.

media.logoDescription: Upload your agency logo. This will be displayed on your profile and job postings.
media.logoHint: Changes will appear immediately in the navigation menu
media.bannerDescription: Upload a banner image for your agency profile. Recommended size: 1200x300 pixels.
